valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 29 Dec 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 30 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: High pressure southwest of Iceland 1040, slow moving with little change by 0600 tomorrow. New high expected Hebrides 1040 by same time
